about_the_game:
Skera is a single-player, puzzle-solving action adventure game designed for VR.

- A Dying World and an Ancient Tower -

In Skera VR, you find yourself imprisoned within an ancient colossal Tower, and a planet slowly decaying around you. Following the stories of your people, you have come here to the Tower to save your people. You will need to face robotic automatons, puzzles and the machinations of an Unpredictable AI. Luckily you have something more than fighting spirit to get you out of this.

- The Guardian Sword, Procedural Cutting!- 

The Guardian Sword isn't simply a weapon, but a tool and a badge of office. Learn to wield the Sword, and it will grow and unlock new forms to give you the means to slice, deflect, and cut your path through the obstacles laid before you. However, the higher you climb the harder things will get. Reaching your desired escape will take creative thinking and honed blade skills.

- Elegant and Deadly Technology -

Despite your world withering away, the dormant Tower has remained untouched by time, built by an ancient civilisation called the Gate Builders. Inside, the Tower is home to potent technology and security measures that you will have to learn to navigate though, all while avoiding and fighting off the many automaton sentries that are waiting for an intruder to trespass. 

- The Last Resident of the Tower, an Ally, and Your Jailer -

The resident AI of the Tower, though your omnipotent jailer, is also your benevolent guide and your only chance to escape your imprisonment. Although they may not seem friendly, you share a common goal. Like you, the mysterious AI is plagued by questions and a desire to reawaken the dormant gateway and find out what happened to its creators - the Gate Builders. Unfortunately, the AI is powerless to fight it's hard coded responses and security systems… After all, you are an unforeseen and unwelcome intruder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060/970, R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: SteamVR only. Oculus Rift, Rift S, Quest, Quest 2, HTC Vive, Vive Pro, Vive Pro 2, Vive Cosmos, WMR Gen1 & 2. Standing Room Minimum
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-6600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080/980TI, Radeon RX Vega 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area strongly recommended.

short_description: Skera is a single-player, puzzle-solving action adventure VR game. Imprisoned within a colossal Tower, you must work with and against the resident AI. Sword in hand, carve your way through puzzles, obstacles and enemies in order to reactivate the mysterious tower and save your dying world.
